sentences.sContent: Natalie was prettier than her sister.
You need that money more than I do.
There were more people there than I expected.
sentences.sCn: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.sContent: If it costs more than $60, I won’t buy it.
sentences.sCn: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.sContent: She had woken even earlier than usual.
sentences.sCn: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.sContent: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.sCn: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

synos.tran: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）

trans.tranOther: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc
